page.title: 17Education,Wick
page.content:
Rhind House, which is the main centre for education in Caithness, was originally an orphanage for girls.Mr.K MacLeod,the Director of Education,has a staff of ten in his offices.There are 20 primary schools in Caithness,2 secondary schools and 2 special units. Among them these have a staff of 300 teachers.Also in Rhind House is part of the Health Board Offices.
In Pulteneytown Academy playground is the Community Education Centre which employs four people and runs seven classes,some in the daytime and some in the evening.Adults attend the classes which include computing and crochet.This centre is new but the scheme is ten years old.
